text:
ary Liver Cancer
								                    Treatment of stages C and D adult primary liver cancer may include the following:         -  Embolization therapy using one of the following methods:               -  Transarterial embolization (TAE).      -  Transarterial chemoembolization (TACE).             -  Targeted therapy.    -  Radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of targeted therapy after chemoembolization or combined with chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of new targeted therapy drugs
